title: Initial Launch of Beat the Streak (BTS) Application:  Terms and Conditions Load
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been freshly installed
And has not previously been launched
But is not updating a previous version of the app on the same device
custom_steps:
When the app launcher icon is tapped
And the splash screen has finished loading

![](index.php?/attachments/get/364)
custom_expected:
Then the Terms & Conditions will be visible 
And tapping on the Accept button will dismiss the Terms and Conditions (T&C) screen

![](index.php?/attachments/get/362)

title: Terms & Conditions - Spelling/Grammar/Formatting
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been freshly installed
And has not previously been launched
But is not updating a previous version of the app on the same device
custom_steps:
When the app launcher icon is tapped
And the splash screen has finished loading
custom_expected: Then the Spelling/Grammar/Formatting are correct on the T&C

title: Log In/Sign Up Screen Load
custom_preconds:
Given the app is installed
And you have accepted the Terms and Conditions on initial app install
custom_steps: When the Terms and Conditions are accepted on initial app install
custom_expected:
Then Log In/Sign Up screen loads

![](index.php?/attachments/get/363)

title: How to Play Button
custom_preconds:
Given the Log In/Sign Up screen is
And the user has not logged in
custom_steps:
When the How to Play button is tapped
And tapping on the Cancel button dismisses the How to Play screen
custom_expected:
Then the 'How to Play' webview is displayed
And tapping on the Cancel button dismissed the How to Play screen

![](index.php?/attachments/get/367)

title: How to play - Links/Grammar/Spelling
custom_preconds: Given the 'How to Play' screen is displayed
custom_steps:
When the links are tapped
And Grammar and Spelling is checked
custom_expected: Then all links are functional and the text are free of grammar and spelling issues

title: Official Rules Screen
custom_preconds: Given the Log In/Sign Up screen is displayed
custom_steps:
When the Official Rules link is tapped on the bottom of the screen
And tapping the Accept button dismisses the screen
custom_expected:
Then Official Rules webview is displayed
And tapping on the Accept button dismisses the screen

![](index.php?/attachments/get/366)

title: Official Rules Links/Grammar/Spelling
custom_preconds: Given that the Official Rules webview is displayed
custom_steps:
When links are tapped
And Grammar and Spelling is checked
custom_expected: Then all links are functional and the text are free of grammar and spelling issues

title: Terms and Conditions - Link on Log In/Sign Screen
custom_preconds: Given the Log In/Sign Up screen is displayed
custom_steps:
When the T&C link is tapped
And Tapping the Accept button dismisses the T&C screen
custom_expected: Then the T&C screen loads & tapping the accept button dismissed the T&C screen

title: Entering the Sign Up tab
custom_steps: When the sign up screen is displayed
custom_expected: Then after entering in the proper credentials you are able to sign up

title: Sign up tab - Required fields
custom_steps: Fill in the sign up field, but intentionally forget to populate a field(s)
custom_expected: Then the error message reminds the user of the forgotten field(s)

title: Entering a non-valid email address
custom_steps: When you enter a non-valid email addres
custom_expected: Then the corresponding error message pops up; "There was a problem with your login process. Please verify your info and try again"

title: Scotts notification page
custom_preconds:
Given the user initially logs into the app for the first time after a fresh install

Verify after logging in for the first time, Scotts email notifications page appears; check box can be toggled on/off;   the submit button and the skip button will both bring you to the My Picks page
custom_steps: When you log in for the first time
custom_expected:
Then then Scotts email notifications page appears
And the check box can be toggled on/off
And the submit button & the skip button will both bring you to the My Picks page

title: No selection on previous day
custom_preconds: User doen't make a select on a previous day
custom_steps: When there is no selection on a previous day
custom_expected: Then the UI will say 'No Selection', indicated by a red 'X' thumbnail

title: If a pick has not been made and the days game has not started yet
custom_steps:
When a pick has not been made
And the current day's game has not been started
custom_expected: Then there will be a blue '+' icon button to select the picks

title: 19 days display on My Picks
custom_steps: When you are on my picks
custom_expected: Then verify 19 days are displayed

title: If Pick Locked time passed
custom_steps:
When a selection locked time passes for the current day
And you have not made a selection
custom_expected: Then there will be no "+" button or a blank thumbnail.

title: Locked picks
custom_steps: Given the start of the first game is at 7:05PM
custom_expected:
Then the selection is rounded down an hour
And the picks are locked at 7:00PM

title: The blue buttons on the my pick screen
custom_steps: When tapping on the blue button from the my picks screen
custom_expected: Then if there are top picks available for that day there will 4 top picks in that tab

title: Tapping on a player in the Top Picks
custom_steps: When tapping on a player in the Top Picks tab will bring up a confirmation pop up with 2 buttons   <Cancel> <Continue>
custom_expected:
Then tapping continue will bring you back to the my picks screen 
And your selected player's thumbnail will appear for that date

title: Daily Matchup
custom_steps: When tapping on the blue arrow next to a player in the top picks page
custom_expected: Then it will displays the batter/pitcher matchup information for that day

title: Tapping on a player when the pitcher is not known
custom_steps: When tapping on a player & the pitcher is not known
custom_expected:
Then there will be a blank thumbnail
And the batters season stats will display

title: All Players Tab
custom_steps: When on the All Players Tab
custom_expected:
Then the teams should show the opposing team as well as the probable pitcher
And TBD if not known

title: Team Pages
custom_steps: When on the team pages
custom_expected:
Then the players are sorted in alphabetical order by last name, their current year Batting Average
And the probable pitcher with ERA 
And TBD if not known

title: Changing a pick
custom_steps: When you tap a date with a player already selected
custom_expected:
Then verify you changed the pick by tapping change pick 
And it should bring you through the regular pick selection flow

title: History tab
custom_steps: When tapping on the history tab
custom_expected:
Then it will show the results of the players and if no player was chosen for that day 
And will say 'No selection -for- (in red)'

title: Leaderboard Tab
custom_steps: When on the Leaderboard tab
custom_expected:
Then there are two tabs 'Active' and 'Season' which are both selectable
And 'Active' will be default

title: Active Tab
custom_steps: When on the Active Tab on the Leaderboard Tab
custom_expected:
Then it will show your rank as well are your current streak on top
And the top users and their current streaks.

title: Info links
custom_steps: When on the links page
custom_expected: Then verify that all links open up their corresponding webviews.

title: Logout button
custom_steps: When on the settings page
custom_expected: Then tapping on 'Logout' button will log you out and bring you back to the Sign In page

title: Adding/Changing multiple picks - Crash Test
custom_steps: When adding/changing picks 10 successive times
custom_expected: Then verify that app doesn't crash

title: Current Streak Number
custom_steps: When on the my picks page
custom_expected: Then verify the current streak number on the top right is accurate

title: Previous day's pick
custom_steps: When tapping on a previous day's pick
custom_expected: Then the pick wil show the at bats for that player in the game
